name: tm35
effect: Teaches Flamethrower to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Flamethrower to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Sleep Talk Gen I: Metronome)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Looses a stream of fire that may burn the foe.
flavor_text.emerald: Looses a stream of fire that may burn the foe.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The foe is scorched with intense flames. The foe may suffer a burn.
